reviews.review: Pretty good game

Has the best shooting mechanics in cs history.
Deleted scenes are better than the main condition zero.
Has interesting mechanics.
Fun to comeback and play after some time.
Graphics are great for its time.
Has some issues like "where the f*ck do I go" in some missions.
Some times spooky stuff happens like a suicide bomber explodes behind you like a creeper in minecraft.

overall 9/10 beat the whole game in 1 sitting.

Pra quem está em duvida em qual é o cs 1.6 normal usado para jogar em servidores online, nos pacotes em baixo na descrição vai estar os nomes dos jogos que vem, o normal esta escrito apenas como "counter-strike", caso queira apenas ele, recomendo comprarem o primeiro pacote, é um ótimo jogo a final!!
An offline storyline addon for CS 1.6, really old so not perfect. 7/10

Imo CSCZ's idea was amazing. The idea of a CS-style fast shooter with real-life police siege tactics was so good, but CSS overshadowed CSCZ, simply because CSS had a new engine and CSCZ was using the original Half-Life engine. If CSCZ was actually a Source game, it would be so popular, but it isn't. If someone makes a new Tour of Duty CS game, it would certainly become very popular. You have to keep in mind that if we had a CS game with both singleplayer and multiplayer, you didn't have to complain about the gamemodes, you had lots of options. If i wanted to play with bots in CSCZ, i usually made my own server, added bots and simply just made it more fun and i used non-Tour of Duty maps such as 747 or Vostok and it was so much fun. But what was the past is kind of forgotten. I like that people actually are nowadays interested about CSCZ and its deleted scenes, it shows that old forgotten games can be even more fun than the hyped games. 

not to forget that this game had one of the best CS soundtracks/theme, unlike CSS which didnt have absolutely nothing.

我承诺，在V社未曾就两位发表辱华言论的选手（ID：kuku；ID：skem）进行足以服众的惩罚或发表展示诚意的公告之前，不会再往V社系游戏（dota2，csgo，etc.）里充一分钱。
I promise that I will not add any funds to the Valve’s games(for example dota 2 and csgo), until the Valve gives appropriate punishments or announcements about the insulting speech given by two professional players(ID: Kuku; Skem).

多名DOTA2职业选手公然发表辱华言论，甚至正式比赛中公屏发表辱华言论，valve不仅没有立即制止，并且对中国玩家的合理要求（处罚该职业选手）视而不见，严重伤害了中国玩家。
本人仅代表个人，再次要求valve严惩涉事职业选手kuku skem，净化游戏环境，并对valve消极态度向全体中国玩家道歉。
鉴于目前valve极其消极的态度，本人在此声明：即日起停止任何valve系游戏（包括但不仅限于DOTA2，CSgo等）的任何消费活动，停止任何valve系游戏（包括但不仅限于DOTA2，CS，传送门等）游戏的游玩，停止steam渠道的任何游戏的购买。在valve将此事合理解决之前，我将不会停止以上行为，也不会更改或删除此评论。

Muy bueno, es prácticamente ídentico al CS 1.6, la diferencia es que este tiene una mejora visual (muy mínima) y un modo historia, el cual aún no pruebo.
Puntos a destacar: el multijugador va bien, es rápido, todo dependerá de tu internet, lo malo es que ya no hay muchos servidores para jugar en español, los que hay están moddeados, es un punto negativo para los que les gusta el clásico, pero por lo demás, excelente.
TOPPEN !

Para quem é fã de CS obrigatoriamente deve ter o Condition Zero em sua biblioteca. Um clássico. O jogo é bom em mapas, sendo que alguns deles são novos; os gráficos também são muito realistas, e os novos personagens (T e CT) que colocaram com novos trajes, são demais! A jogabilidade também é muito boa pois diferente do 1.6, você pode fazer missões neste.

Görevler fena değil ama oyun eski olduğu için bazı sorunlar var. Grafikler çok iyi değil. Düşmanlar üzerimize çok ayarsız geliyor. Türkçe desteği olmaması çok büyük bir eksik. Bu şirketlerin çalışanları artık Türkçe altyazılı oyun yapmalı. Eski oyunlarda geliştirilmeli.

Ce jeu est méconnu et putain pour une fois qu'un mode solo pour un fps est si bien fait! bien sur il respire les premiers fps apres Half Life (tracé lineaire, tonneaux qui explosent, les trucs classiques des FPS) et pourtant le jeu est bien, avec des mini parties de puzzles bien foutu, je l'ai fini et je n'ai pas ragé une seule fois, 17/20 car il a quand même bien vielli contrairement a d'autres jeux
